detail_desc: Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and mesh sections on the legs.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Trousers in different colours of cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with buttons at the top and press-studs at the crotch. Dungarees in woven fabric with elastication at the waist and hems, a patch pocket on one leg and straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front.
Jacket in organic cotton corduroy with a wide, pile-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a hat and gloves in a soft knit. Pattern-knit hat with a pompom on top and a ribbed turn-up at the hem. Fine-knit gloves with wide ribbed cuffs.
Thin metal chain necklaces in different designs with pendants. Adjustable length from 40-48 cm and 53-61 cm.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a textured weave with a concealed hook and eye, zip fly, side pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back and tapered legs with creases.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Padded gilet with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative buttons. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, seam down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with raw edges and fringing on the short sides. Size approx. 110x200 cm.
Biker jacket in sturdy wool-blend twill with a faux fur collar and diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a detachable belt at the hem with a metal buckle. Lined.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bikini top with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top of the front. Short shorts with a smocked waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Signet rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
Trousers in a soft rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and flared legs.

Cargo trousers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Welt side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Empire-line dress in tulle embroidered with dangling sequins. Short, flutter sleeves and an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Satin lining.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cropped top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Trims around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe. Straight cut at the top, wide shoulder straps and a short slit at the hem. Unlined.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck and low dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing at the hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tube scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Width 24 cm, circumference approx. 42 cm.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist. Lined front.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic bow at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and scalloped insoles in satin made from recycled polyester.
Oversized top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length coat in a brushed weave with narrow notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening, dropped shoulders and flap front pockets. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Shorts in soft jersey with side pockets and wide elastication with smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit.

Set with a sleeveless blouse, pair of puff pants and a hairband in a cotton weave. Blouse with a double layer at the top and shoulder straps with a decorative bow. Puff pants with covered elastication at the waist and around the legs. Hairband with a decorative bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims. V-neck opening at the top, a round neckline with twisted ties and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Imitation leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 8 cm.
Joggers in a soft knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is partly recycled.
Thin metal chain necklace with a ring-shaped metal pendant. Adjustable length, approx. 42-48 cm.
Cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist and frills at the front. Jersey lining.
Short dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves that have covered elastication at the hems. Elasticated seam and narrow ties under the bust and a flared skirt with a tier. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Retro-look sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Loose-fitting sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Imitation suede trainers with a hook and loop tab and lacing at the front, a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a crinkled effect. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top, and long, slightly wider sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a recycled polyester weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Hat in soft garter-stitched cotton with a ribbed hem.
Trainers in cotton with an elastic gore and elasticated lacing at the front. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a press-stud at the sides and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners. Heart-shaped chest pocket, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative gathers at the top. Elasticated seam under the bust and an opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Lined.
V-neck vest top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend in a slightly shorter, flared style.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Knee-length dress in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the top and raglan sleeves with sewn-on ties at the cuffs. Loose yoke at the back, welt side pockets, a soft detachable waist belt with metal D rings and a single back vent. Lined.
Stretch twill treggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and decorations on the legs.
Wide cardigan knitted in soft cashmere with hole-knit details. Deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and a ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fabric cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable tab at the back.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy, patterned jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets with a button.

Denim jumpsuit with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Seam with pleats and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and straight, wide legs.
Shopper with two handles and a tie fastening with metal pendants. Unlined. Size 12x32x33 cm.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short puff sleeves. Seam under the bust and at the waist with elastication at the back, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Trousers in a stretch weave with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front, and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short, glittery tulle puff sleeves with narrow elastication.
Satin V-neck dress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that tie at the back, a seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Asymmetric skirt with a box pleat front and back. Lined.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has gathered elastication at the back and pleats at the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, flared legs with slits at the hems.
Hair set in metal with sparkling decorations in polished plastic. Narrow Alice band with a double row of beads. Two beaded hair clips, length 6.5 cm. Two slim hair grips with beads, length 8 cm.
Jersey top with elastication at the top and short, wide, raglan sleeves with broderie anglaise.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
